name: Lightning
title: ThunderStorm: Lightning energy
author: AivanF
description:
Thunderstorm is coming! Build lightning rods to tame this mighty element of nature. 

Features:
- Natural lightning strikes
- Rods to protect and capture divine amount of electricity
- Powerful thunder artillery towers
- SE / Space Exploration planets support
- API & console commands to modify lightning behaviour by surfaces

In progress:
- Electric potential radar
- Even better performance
- Additional API
